title: mistakenly quit games
body: my laptop is old and crashes alot so it crashed wile playing some matched and i was put into the low priority queue honestly i feel like thats unfair i never wanted to afk or quit it just happens alot with this laptop

replies.body:
Honestly, it does not matter WHY you crash and leave, because it ruins other people's game, despite circumstances. If you cannot secure a stable computer/connection, then you either need to get a new computer or simply stop playing league.

If you enter a game despite KNOWING that your computer can crash at any moment, then you are willingly and knowingly committing tot he risk of making other people's games miserable, and if that then happens, the responsibilities are yours to bear.

Even though you aren't intentionally quitting, those LPQ's are being placed due to how much time your other teammates had to spend trying to 4v5 without a 5th member. Overall, those games were still affected by you not being there, regardless of the intention. 

With your client crashing so much, it's probably time to take a step back and figure out what's going wrong. Check out the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some ways that you should be able to make sure your game runs more smoothly. Also double check the [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654) to make sure your pc is up to par.
